entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
